Texts.Chs: 如果你收到了这条信息，那么你一定是在^orange;古代传送门^reset;附近——请启动它来找到我。^green;你可以用^orange;星核碎片^reset;和^orange;一个三度仪^reset;来激活传送门。
Texts.Eng: If you've picked up this message, you must be near an ^orange;Ancient Gateway^reset; - please activate it to come and find me. ^green;You can power up the Gate with ^orange;Core Fragments^reset; and a ^orange;Tricorder^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 为了修好你的飞船，你需要完成^orange;几个任务^reset;。^green;和我对话^reset;来接取任务。
Texts.Eng: In order to fix your ship you'll need to complete ^orange;several tasks^reset;. ^green;Speak to me^reset; to begin.

Texts.Chs: 我的扫描显示在这个星球上有某种^orange;欢迎信标^reset;我估计有^green;82%的可能性值得调查^reset;，还有98% 的可能性是你没有更好的事情可做。
Texts.Eng: My scans indicate there is some kind of ^orange;Welcome Beacon^reset; on this planet. I estimate a ^green;82% chance that it is worth investigating^reset;, and a 98% chance that you have nothing better to do.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;欢迎^reset;来到我的移动实验室，旅行者！欢迎光临！如果你有任何讨厌的伤口需要愈合，我这有张舒适的大沙发和一间医疗舱！
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Welcome^reset; to my Mobile Lab, traveller! Come on in and visit! I've got a big comfy couch and a medical bay if you have any nasty injuries to heal up!
